headline: Martin Marietta Materials, Inc. (MLM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Martin Marietta Materials, Inc. (MLM) on Stock Analysis Compilation’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MLM. Martin Marietta Materials, Inc. (MLM)’s share was trading at $552.64 as of 12th June. MLM’s trailing and forward P/E were 31.69 and 30.21 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Martin […]
